document_data.caption: "It's a great new fantasy role-playing game. We pretend we're workers and students in an industrialized and technological society."
document_data.name: Papers and Paychecks
document_data.mainbody: '''Papers and Paychecks''' was a role-playing game.
document_data.Description: In it, players adopted the roles of students and workers in a fantasy world with a technological and industrialized society. It was played with [[paper]]s, pencils, and at least two six-sided [[dice]]. It seemed fun.
document_data.Notable Players: [[Karl Chisolm]], a thirteen-year-old boy of [[Ravens Bluff]] in [[the Vast]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], spent his spare time playing Papers and Paychecks with his friends.{{Cite polyhedron/51/The Living City: The Downunda Patisserie|31}}
